huggingface-free.name: Hugging Face (Free)
huggingface-free.description: Completely free, no API key needed. Good quality, 10 requests/minute.

local-ai.name: Local AI (Offline)
local-ai.description: Run AI on your own machine. Unlimited, completely offline.

replicate.name: Replicate
replicate.description: High quality, fast generation. Requires API key.

openai.name: OpenAI DALL-E
openai.description: Highest quality, most expensive. Requires API key.

gemini.name: Google Gemini
gemini.description: Good quality, multimodal. Requires API key.

freeUsage: Start with Hugging Face Free - no setup required
Be patient - free models may take 10-30 seconds
Try different models for different art styles
Use descriptive prompts for better results
localSetup: Install Automatic1111 for easiest local setup
Download models from Hugging Face or Civitai
